noun.description: A domesticated polecat kept as a pet or used, especially in Europe, for catching rabbits. It is typically albino or brown.

verb.description: (of a person) hunt with ferrets, typically for rabbits.
examples: I could show you how to ferret for rabbits

origin: Late Middle English: from Old French fuiret, alteration of fuiron, based on late Latin furo thief, ferret, from Latin fur thief.
